description:
For self rescue scenarios. Things don't always go as planned. This kit covers the basics to get your tour safely back on track.

  • 2-chambered paddle float provides assistance during re-entry
  • Fox 40 Epik whistle is super loud, pea-less and stays functional even when wet
  • Bilge pump moves 8 gallons per minute
  • Boat sponge absorbs excess water
name: NRS Basic Touring Safety Kit - Unisex
